page.title: Xuriella XSLT
page.p: An XSLT processor written in Common Lisp.
Xuriella was written by David Lichteblau and Ivan Shvedunov.
It implements XSLT 1.0 and is available under an X11-style license.
Please send bug reports to cxml-devel@common-lisp.net (list information).

ul.li: not released yet; work in progress
